metadata.title: Bearing Sea FOCI and Southeast Bering Sea Carrying Capacity Chlorophyll, Nutrients, and Zooplankton Database

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS), Alaska Fisheries Science Center (AFSC), Fisheries Oceanography Coordinated Investigations (FOCI)

metadata.description: Chlorophyll, nutrient, and zooplankton samples were collected during Bering Sea FOCI and Southeast Bering Sea Carrying Capacity programs over the continental slope and shelf of the southeastern Bering Sea.
metadata.notes:
Purpose: Understand biological mechanisms that influence the productivity at lower trophic levels and energy available to higher trophic levels of the Bering Sea ecosystem.

Status: In Progress

Maintenance frequency: Continually

Access constraints: Permission of the Contributor required..

Use constraints: Consent of the Contributor required.
